short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications about all news from BBC World. Add the with BBC News Notifier to your Chrome and stay informed about latest news

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This News Notifier extension is developed to access BBC World News with no need to visit BBC website multiple times a day. BBC News Notifier provides instant access to most important news right in your browser.

Add this extension to you Chrome and always stay tuned. We will let you know as soon as about latest news appear on BBC World News website. Stay focused on your life and will take care of following news 24/7.


Do not miss any important news from all over the World with BBC News Notifier
